_sText:
This map is planned, detailed and build as a prestige object. 
It has multiple ways to the two bomb sites 
(On in the Research depatment and one in the generator room) 


----------------------------------------------

This map includes:

custom textures 
custom models 
dynamic water
detail.vbsp (Grass Sprites on world spawn)
intelligent use of Hint brushes and func_detail

Bot support
Camerasystem at the 2 bomb sites (displys in the Controlroom)
Ambient sound for the right mood
Little easteregg under the CT spot

Detailed appearance of an old facility, which is abandoned for years.
TPHI (Three Point Heavy Industries) is a self-created brand of me 
 that I'm used to use in my mecha drawings.


I haven't played the map yet, so I can't tell, if its balanced or optimized in the spawn points. Give me your impressions when there is something I can do better.

sorry for my english, I`m not used to write so much lately
Hope you download and enjoy!
